channel.title: ShardBlazer
channel.description:
[size=10pt][u][center]ShardBlazer[/center][/u][/size]
[b]Base and Stability:[/b] The server is based off the extremely efficient Shard Revolutions created by Graham. The server has full protection against Syi and googleBot, and there are no null's, because the login system has been completely re-written. The server has been tested with 200+ bots, all spamming without a crash, and a cpu usage of only 50%.
[b]What will you see?:[/b] The server will be focused around skilling, but with a complete overhaul of Shard's player vs player. The economy will be at fair prices, and lvling will be at a decent rate, such as about 20-40 xp per hit. The server will feature some form of minigame, hopefully a barrows at least. The skills will be upgraded and new ones released, hopefully including Runecrafting, Crafting, Smithing, Mining, Fletching, Wcing, Fishing, Slayer, and Magic.
[b]What makes this server different?:[/b] ShardBlazer's main feature is how it will be based of something NOT Deltascape based, and have extremely high stability.
[b]Release Date:[/b] ShardBlazer's targeted release date is around the middle of may.
[IMG]http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f336/enjoi19bucket/syi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f336/enjoi19bucket/action-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f336/enjoi19bucket/lvl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f336/enjoi19bucket/shop1.png[/img]
The server will be under the GNU General Public License. item.title: ShardBlazer
item.dc:creator: @enjoi19 enjoi19
item.description:
@enjoi19 wrote:

Im working on it daily :D. And im glad to see people appreciate non-delta servers lmao :p. And i agree with the skilling comment. most people tend to focus on custom items and pking. I mean anybody can add models lmao?

Read full topic

looks good already :P-not delta woot!- i like how your going to focus on skilling, not alot of people do that, looking for more in the future so keep us informed!

@enjoi19 wrote:

[size=10pt][center]ShardBlazer[/center][/size]

Base and Stability: The server is based off the extremely efficient Shard Revolutions created by Graham. The server has full protection against Syi and googleBot, and there are no null’s, because the login system has been completely re-written. The server has been tested with 200+ bots, all spamming without a crash, and a cpu usage of only 50%.

What will you see?: The server will be focused around skilling, but with a complete overhaul of Shard’s player vs player. The economy will be at fair prices, and lvling will be at a decent rate, such as about 20-40 xp per hit. The server will feature some form of minigame, hopefully a barrows at least. The skills will be upgraded and new ones released, hopefully including Runecrafting, Crafting, Smithing, Mining, Fletching, Wcing, Fishing, Slayer, and Magic.

What makes this server different?: ShardBlazer’s main feature is how it will be based of something NOT Deltascape based, and have extremely high stability.

Release Date: ShardBlazer’s targeted release date is around the middle of may.
